front.title: Thermography of single line scans performed on the commercial powder bed fusion machine for the Additive Manufacturing Benchmark Test Series (AM-Bench 2018)

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: This document provides details on the files available in the dataset "In situ thermographic measurements of single line scans performed for the Additive Manufacturing Benchmark Test Series (AM-Bench 2018)." These measurements are performed as part of the Additive Manufacturing Benchmark Test Series (AMBench) supporting the melt pool geometry (length) and cooling rate challenges (CHAL-AMB2018-02-MP-Length and CHAL-AMB2018-02-CR). The following sections provided details on the experiments and data files.

seriesInfo.name: NIST advanced manufacturing series; NIST AMS
